content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog when i noticed 2 green orbs flying overhead. i thought it was a helicopter or plane but it was noiseless. my husband doesn't believe me, but i know what i saw.
content.summary: Unidentified object over central corridor of phoneix

content.detailedDescription: Saw lights from my backyard. managed to get footage of it. i managed to get this footage of it around central phoenix.
content.summary: Green ufo above central phoenix, arizona

content.detailedDescription: I was getting ready to go to bed, but i decided to walk my dog in the backyard at 10:50 pm. when i go out, i was looking up at the stars, as i usually do every night when i walk my dog. when on my right peripheral vision, i notice something moving in the sky. i focused on this thing and at first i thought is was a formation of birds, but then i realized that whatever i was looking at, was in space! i was looking at a triangular formation of dim lights in space as it traveled from north to south right over my backyard. the shape was like the outline of an ice cream cone. i stood there with my mouth wide open, trying not to lose sight of it. in the mean time, i was trying to count the lights. one was in the front and i counted at least five on one side. i really couldn't concentrate on counting the lights because my mind was racing and my heart rate was increasing! on top of that, i was being distracted by the falling meteors that would flash and disappear. the lights i was observing were way above the meteors that were falling. that's way i know these lights were in space. though, i couldn't tell if it was one solid object or multiple individual objects. after, i lost sight of the lights, i brought the dog in and i ran up to my son's room and told him what i just saw. we both came down and went out back and pulled a couple of chairs and sat there for 45 minutes hoping we would see something else. all we saw were a couple more meteors falling and one airplane in the 45 minutes we were out there.
content.summary: Triangular formation of multiple lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Your sight keeps disappearing,went information is add.Maybe they don't want contact.My gmail is [email address removed/cms/tg]].Take digital camera,point at any part of sky,like power lines or south.
content.summary: Hovering over days inn on 11th.St.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my girl friend's house waiting for her to get ready so we can leave, so i thought i'd wait outside and star gaze. i noticed a very peculiar looking star, very low to the ground, blinking, flashing, and pulsating different colors. so i start flashing my flashlight on my key chain at it, s.O.S. thinking i'm being foolish, even when it starts to drift away, i'm still thinking it's a star. then right before it becomes out of view it starts to wobble and pulsate red, blue, and white. i knew this couldn't be a star, even called my girl friend over to make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me. and she confirmed it was moving. seeing as she is deathly afraid of aliens, she goes back inside. shortly after the "star" is no longer visible, a big flash of light out of nowhere comes from the trees around the area where i first noticed the "star". this light is still at first for a couple seconds and i'm thinking it's someone's porch light, (in the middle of the woods). the light starts moving, and its moving slightly off from my direction, goes through the trees slowly and towards the backyard, so i run off the porch and run to the back fence as far as i can go, and now i can make out the shape of this object, it was your average bumper sticker ufo, and it had 2 or 3 large lights in the center of it, slowly rotating. i was going to jump the fence and continue to chase it, until i remembered the neighbors own a dog. so i didn't want to risk it. not to mention i was very afraid and excited at the same time but i kept telling myself to be brave. there was a time where i thought to myself, "this may not be such a good idea..." (chasing it down). and from there, it flew til i no longer had sight of the object. it was traveling eastbound at a constant slow, eerie pace. and that was my very first ufo sighting in my life. 
for those who are interested, syracuse and it's neighboring cities have strange objects in the skies almost every night. since my first sighting i've observed ufo's and orange spheres in fayetteville, nedrow, and the indian reservation by nedrow. as soon as it gets dark, the party starts. it may take patience. worse part is, no one cares. even those who genuinely believe me, don't seem to care too much. those who doubt me aren't lifting a finger to debunk me. don't take my word for it, go see for yourself. they are out there almost every night. question is why are they here? (assuming the objects are of e.T. origin). could be government crafts flying around, or both... am i sounding crazy yet? like i said, don't take my word for it, go and find one, or one will find you. they're out there almost every night.
content.summary: Syracuse, ny and it's surrounding cities has been booming with ufo's as of late. crafts i've observed were: spheres, triangles, saucer shaped, and star-like.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the street from my house when i witnessed a triangle shaped object emerge from behind a mountain in north mountain preserve, phoenix. it had three glowing green lights that, at times, seemed to pulsate. at first i thought it was an airplane but it was way too big, and moved very strangely. i immediately ran and grabbed my camera from my house. when i came back outside, one of the lights was gone, and as i started filming, the object changed direction and started flying directly towards me. it flew right over me. as it flew over, i couldn't help but shudder. it was completely silent but seemed like a dark mass above me. it flew southwest and it seemed to fade into the distance before i saw a small flash and it was gone. i have attached the footage i filmed of it flying towards me. very eerie...
content.summary: Three green lights in a triangle shape that turned into two green lights and flew over me.

content.detailedDescription: I saw this ufo at about 2200 local and as i type this is now 0031 and just left to come inside and it was still there in the sky.  it hovered and had very irratic movements.  i had to see if i could get it on my camera and i did.  shot about 14min of video of the craft.  i was taking out the trash to the cans in the ally when i noticed the light in the sky.  i noticed it because i thought is was a planet as it was the brightest thing in the sky.  the object was round as far as i could see or disk, hard to say my glasses make light look like starbursts.  i felt very excited as i saw how this object moved and was not sure i saw it move like fast in a short spirt, untill it did that again. the object was still in the sky when i came inside.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw what looked like a planet then the light move fast and irratic

content.detailedDescription:
I want to remain completely anonymous on this account so (1) you will know that i am 100% not doing this for fame or attention and (2) so my friends, business clients (some who are religious), work colleagues, etc... will not think i'm insane. i hope you don't mind that i provided no contact information - i don't have any other info you can get from me other than what's in this report.  i did not take video so it's not like anyone will believe me anyways but i hope you will review this and maybe someone out there also saw it or will believe me.

i was also not dreaming nor asleep.  i swear this is what i saw that evening.

i was driving on local road. environment = dark, around 6-7pm. the area is prone to police helicopters so as soon as i saw a large dark object hovering and moving ahead slowly above my car, i immediately thought "helicopter" and kept my eyes on the road and my mind distracted by the non-related events in my life earlier that day. 

up ahead, i stopped at a red light.  no longer focused on the road, i randomly glanced up again.  the thing is now lower - about 20ft above my car. and that's when it hit me: helicopters make noise right? lots of engine noise.  this thing above my car was completely silent. not only that, despite it being the size of a helicopter, there were no rotary blades.  and i swear i am not lying when i say this, but at the bottom of its body was some sort of blue screen.  i realized it covered half the vehicle's body. i have no idea what it was.  to get an idea of what i saw, picture a hovering helicopter the size of the presidential helicopters you see on tv where obama walks off and waves.  now imagine a helicopter that big with a huge plasma tv  screen that covers half the bottom of the helicopter that's playing a rock concert where the entire show is in blue.  basically half the bottom of the craft or whatever it was, was flickering blue.  not anything i ever seen.  it looked like some of those computer screens you only see in star wars movies. it did not look like a light bulb but rather some sort of weird show of "pictures" or symbols that merged into one another that i cannot comprehend.

while i was stopped at that red light, it ascended again and flew off. again, completely silent.  no exhaust flames, no rotating blades, nothing.  i knew i should have taken a picture but at that moment my heart felt like it was beating 50mph, my mouth opened in shock, and i was just completely in awe of the object...Even a bit of an admiration i would say. before i could even think about reaching for my blackberry to take a shot, it flew off quickly.

anyways, that's what i saw that evening.  i never told anyone for fear of being called crazy.  other drivers on that road probably thought it was a helicopter and didn't even give it a second look.  i hoping that's not the case and more people come out.  i searched everywhere on the net.  i believe i'm the first one to come out about this incident.
content.summary: Saw ufo hovering over my car with

content.detailedDescription: I look in the sky after dark when i smoke a cigarette and always have binoculars. light came from south east blinking white then red and each blink it was in a different spot 100-500 feet  apart from the last blink, sometimes ending up 1000's of feet back in its origanal flight path. it would be in random spots each time it blinked, up down back and forward, continuing in a north east direction  till it was gone. got that excited feeling in my chest. seen same object at 6: 40 am but only white blinking on the same exact course.
content.summary: Red and white blinking light  appearing in different spots travelling north east

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my hot tub watching the stars, jets and satellites passing overhead; we're in northern california in redding right under the jet corridor from southern california and the northwest u.S. many nights have been spent observing the skies. last night 9-30-11 i caught an image of something flying south at a very unusual high rate of speed...Enough to actually make me stand up. the object was crescent shaped with lights moving through what appeared to be liquid without a specific geometric pattern. it came from the northern horizon at a very high rate of speed approx. 30 degrees off the horizon heading south. what got me to stand up in the hot tub was that it began to turn east quickly in a 45 degree arc covering nearly one third the horizon line before it quickly snapped to a southern flight at a higher rate of speed in a slight "s" pattern heading due south where i observed it until the end of my observable horizon line.
the object was very visible, flew in what i felt was a frantic pattern and emotionally caused the hair on my body to stand up simply because what i saw
was not normal in any way and in fact seemed more cinematic and unreal.
i assumed seeing something like this would be more interesting instead of eerie and somewhat threatening. this object possessed an immeasurable power that i can't relate to which stirs the soul more than ever. i called my wife and brother and couldn't find the words that would convince them that what i saw was very very unnatural and disturbing. as for size it seemed to be somewhere between the altitude of passenger jets and myself..If this were the case then the object would be quite large. if it were at the altitude of passenger jets i would then assume it's size to be massive. what bothered me was the motion, silence and hesitation of flight. it moved with purpose and this bothers me.
content.summary: Visually this was very disturbing and very real

content.detailedDescription: My husband was on the phone outside at approx 9:45 pm when spotted it above our house, he banged on the door for me to come out and pointed it out to me.  it was boomerang shaped, the color was very hard to decipher i would describe it as being like a hard shear curtain color, hard mist... very hard to describe.  it was moving very slow, and levitated in one place for about 5 seconds, moved to the right, then continued to move forward (which would be east from our home) then it was gone. lost sight once it went east, feelings are indescribable, i was excited, in awe, but dumbfounded.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo boomerang shaped, mist colored on path, hovered then went to the right, then east

content.detailedDescription: These lights just appeared out of thin air while i was outside with my dogs. my dogs barked at the ufo then they started to howl and ran off whimpering. the lights hovered around then moved in patterns, i watched for what seemed to be 5 minutes in till the lights shot off and dispersal, only after they left did my two dogs stop whimpering.
content.summary: I was outside when these lights showed up.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife called on her way home from work describing a line of lights in the sky near our home. i went outside in my pjs and observed one light through the trees. i waited for my son to get in the car, we pulled out, waiting for a passing car, and drove 6 blocks towards the light which traveled very slowly perpendicular in a true north and south direction. just slightly off from the n/s street grid.

it only managed to move about 2 blocks to our left while we moved 6 towards, and 2 over. it them seemed to be behind us and passing over as i snapped some pics with my iphone. my son and i observed it and as i switched the phone to camera mode the light disappeared. a few minutes later we could see a jet take off from a distant international airport. i'd have to say that the upf was about a mile higher than the plane and appearing almost as large in the sky.

the light was really deceiving. as if it was only as high as a sky scraper, and at the same time miles high like the bombers i'd watch take off in az.
content.summary: Constant single point light

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking out of work after midnight.  i rode my bike to work and while i was unchaining it in the parking lot, i noticed a falling star (meteor) falling to the earth.  i stopped to pause and look at it; roughly a meteor is something caught with the naked eye monthly, and as i was staring at it, it stopped in mid-air.  it then "descended" from it's stopping point and became, in my vision, as large as half of the size of our moon, and 3/4 as luminous as venus is in the night sky.  it "grew" in size from a pinpoint of light (meteor) to as big as half of our moon, and then proceeded to travel east.  it hovered/jerked around for around five seconds (zigzagging in a small area) before it hovered away to the west towards lincoln, ne.  it spent 3 seconds flying westward before it disappeared - it did not fly past the horizon, it simply disappeared in the air.  
i rode my bike to a hill below harrison street after the incident; it took me five minutes to get there.  after i got to the hill, i called my brother and told him about it.  he was shocked by what i had seen.  i disconnected; on my bike roughly ten minutes later, he claimed to have stepped outside to smoke a cigarette, and saw three orbs flying above lavista in formation, led by a blinking strobe orb, and followed by two brightly lit ones.  the strobe-orb flew away from the other two orbs, and then the remaining two orbs flew off in the opposite direction.  
i can only verify what i have seen with my own eyes (the original orb seen at 12312 port grace blvd,) the encounter lasted roughly 2-3 seconds for the falling meteorite, 5 seconds for the meteorite to expand and "grow" into a large size, and then 3 seconds heading westward before disappearing.  i have seen this with my own eyes and testify it is true.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A ball of light descended from the sky, and shot off towards lincoln, ne (offutt air force base)

content.detailedDescription: About 4 a.M. looking toward orion (southeast) observed object translucent orangish, in the shape of half a butterfly moving rapidly in arc and then disappeared.
content.summary: Reporting on behalf of my sister who does not have computer, it is ok to contact her.  saw a translucent object orangish in color shaped like half butterfly as she was looking southeast toward orion, it made an arc around her and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside video taping a plane coming into ottawa airport with a new ipad. a few weeks later my son was looking at the pictures and videos i had taken with th ipad and found the orb in the video i had taken weeks earlier. after watching the video and examining it over and over, it does not appear to be due to camera movement or reflective lights. the orb seems to zoom in from the horizon follow above the plane , then move up then down the move quickly forward ahead of the plane and fade out or into possible cloud cover. was really interesting to see video and thought i would forward it on to mufon.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orb apears to zoom into video of plane follows plane then moves up down and then away

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 16 i was living rural area and decided to go to friends house about a mile or so away. i called my friend and he said he would meet me and we both started out walking towards one another. it was dark out when i started out . as i walk to the corner of my street i noticed a bright star that seemend low to me and was brighter than the other stars that were out that night but did not think much about it and continued walking. where i lived there were no street lights as it was a country road with very few houses along the way.
     i walked about a mile before i met up with my friend . he said to me look up that light has been moving slowly from the direction you were walking as if it was following you or just following the course of the the road!We both starred at it for a few seconds at it then it flew over a field where it met another star like light which was stationary then they both zig/zagged across the night sky then flew side by side to the north west dirction slow at first then vanished out of sight. there was no sound from the lights at any time that we could hear.
    the best way i can discribe the movement and speed of these lights , would be just as you would shine a laser pointer on a wall then zig / zagged the light as fast as you could from right to left, this is how fast they moved!My friend look at me and said i am certain our military has nothing that can move like this. you see my friends dad was in the airforce and my friend was a airplane nerd, he had models of fighter jets hanging from his bedroom ceiling and all kinds of posters of differant jets and such all over his room. this was his love in life studying air craft.
    when those lights moved from side to side as they were playing with one another our mouths just drop , i mean my god man what can move like this? where did they come from? we were amazed and very confused . we decided not to tell our other friends back at his house or any one else, this was his idea and said they all will think were crazy. i have kept this to my self all these years only to tell my wife. i have many questions now, i have witnessed a life changing advent that i can not share with out being labeld. i know what i seen and now the only witness has passed away leaving me with this burden of knowing which most do not have a clue what is out there. i sware to you this is a true statement and will take it to my grave.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large orbs bright as a star folled me as i walk to meet a friend about a mile away another ufo appeard they zig zagged then flew north at amazing speed

content.detailedDescription: i saw something coming directly over us. it was perfectly quiet flying in formation. no lights were visible except for two which we decending and had like landing lights on. they were apparently absorbed by the six bigger objects. they made a turn about a point and went over a business but were huge when they came over us. the first turn about a point was a left turn. they made another turn about a point in an ascending manner to the right. then they just hit the button and were out of sight fast enough you could only observe one. apparently they hit the edge of our atmosphere and emitted a bright blue pinpoint of light and just disappeared. i had just closed on a house and was moving so i had no camera. however i can make a very detailed drawing and can show the flight path involved.
content.summary: 6 orange and dull silver flying in  formation

content.detailedDescription:
E-mail received by asd today - i have replied and am awaiting a return call for more information. 


i just saw an orange/red probe flying over midtown, kc. my office is 11th floor of 3100 broadway. looking south, one flew just north of the vfw building. kind of looked like a bird - kind of flapping and turning, but really was gliding. was metallic in that the sun would glint off the wings. more of a globe/ball on the bottom. it flew at about the 14th floor level is my guess. flew from west to east. 

what are these things doing?

i saw a white globe a couple of months ago hanging out in south kansas city. very high. maybe a satellite but it never seemed to move. hung there for 1-2 hours at least and then i left work so not sure how long it was up.

anyway, just thought if you are tracking, i should report. i've never been this close - literally a block as a crow flies (haha) and eye level almost.
content.summary: Red/orange object with wings and globe in downtown kansas city

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving with friends down to portmansfield my father is a famous fisherman who we were visiting we were about an hour an a half away where its all brush country ''king ranch area'' 
  when i first say it i didn't think that much i thought is some type of communication tower...As we drove closure i could literally see there was nothing! nothing holding it up...It literally was a pure white sphere except the bottom seems to be more tucked in i guess or more skinner...What first amazed me was the fact of this thing looked like it was just ''stuck'' in the sky. i was not afraid of that...What made all my hair stand up was the fact that this sphere that turned side ways slowly and i swear on everything holy it took off so fast! it left a kinda clear trial when it ''went'' where is went. now i am a 25yr old former marine. and the man that was with me is a high caliber man that works for the government with his two sons...His two sons were saying look over and over again to there dad...I know he saw it but he is a huge cristian and by the look on his eyes i think he was trying to block it out.
   i tried to rationalize the thing but i couldn't a buddy who used to work on predator drones i went to military school with before the military assured me '' we got nothing like that and no human could survive going that fast faster then a blink of an eye.
   before i called him i tried think maybe it was a balloon....But the thing stayed perfectly still...The wind was blowing south east at the time and it took off against the wind...No balloon can do this.....Can someone please help me try and identify this please!? its ok to text me before you call my name is patrick but call me pat =) 956 746 1080.....I study and research ufo's my whole life and i used to believe but seeing this i know for a fact...Once you see something like this there is no rationalizing
  again my name is patrick ''pat'' and text before you call (number moved to fi box) cms 09/30/11 17:44 cst flg
content.summary: Atleast 15ft.Sphere all white. hovered. then took off against the wind

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i saw a light that at first we thought was a plane move in a westerly direction and abruptly move north it was not a turn as you would see with a plane.The closest i can come to explaining the movement is like a helicopter can fly sideways but the light did not stop and then move sideways it was moving forward heading west and then it shot north and was out of sight much faster than it seemed possible from watching the way planes fly. it was like it was moving at a steady pace and as soon as it changed direction it moved like at a speed like nothing i have ever seen.It seemed to me it had to be a ufo or some top secret aircraft.We were in the country at her home we had gone out for me to smoke.When we first saw the light we had been looking at the stars and when we saw the light and we thought it was a plane we had seen planes fly over this area alot when it changed direction like it did we both said that was no plane. it was maybe white i am not sure after so much time.The color was not that big a deal to me compared to the way it moved.We were pretty stunded at first we then went in and told her boyfriend he did not believe us.We were a little excited to have seen something like this.
content.summary: Light in the sky that changed direction abruptly

content.detailedDescription:
I was around 21 years old and was loading farm product on a truck, open dock with a beautiful view of the farm meadow. i'm now 55.
it caught my eye, the colors were unreal, i always look up at the sky at night but this caught my eye.
i called the other workers out to see it, they kept asking me what is it, after a while i said it might be a ufo.
it looked just like one of those toys you pump on the top and it spins, the middle was blasting all kinds of light.
my boss at the time had a master's degree and worked for nasa, but his dad fell ill and he came back home to run the business so i called him and said you have to see this object in the sky. he was a mile away, i also called the police. i ran down to the house and brought back binoculars, my boss just pulled up the colors were unreal but wouldn't stay in view through the binoculars. i asked my boss "what is it?" he said ii don't know. 
than a couple police cars pull up and they told me they have been watching it for over a hour about 5 miles away at a k-mart parking lot. the cop said to me "i will not report this, i like my job". than we were all looking up at it and out of nowhere two white objects fly into at an unreal speed, it looked like two shooting stars hit it. than it slowly faded away.
 best part is now, 15 plus years later my friend bill is explaining to the date and time what i saw. we were in shock that someone else seen this, he was getting a drink of water and saw it out his kitchen window. we still talk about it, he's now 60 years old. the dumb newspapers at the time said people were calling in about lights in the sky, what they were seeing was zarrahpaths radio tower lights. wrong, those lights nowhere near our ufo. i wrote a whole page in detail back than, it's at a friends house, i never asked for it but i'm sure they still have it, he worked on the dock with me. i spoke of this event at a very high class ufo meeting at a local college, and i mean only professional people were allowed in. i got to know a professor really well from rutgers and he wanted me to join him at this closed meeting. he told me this will blow you away but i think you can handle it. i know after hearing people tell their stories what i saw was real. the average joe would of passed out or have a heart attack that evening.
content.summary: I will not fail a lie detector, way out over the 82 acre field it just stayed there than two objects entered it at a high rate of speed than if left.

content.detailedDescription:
Between 9:00-9:45 sept 29,2011

we were driving north on i-69 and there was a major accident that had traffic backed up for miles.  we slowly made it to the uniontown exit and took a right.  the interstate was shut down forcing everyone to exit.  once at the top of the overpass you could see tons of emergency vehicles just north of the exit tending to an accident.  the traffic was all funneling towards hwy 31 to the left, so we took a right to avoid the mess.  our route put us onto comisky pike which dumps back into 31n.  we joined the masses of detoured traffic back on 31n and right at kriete corner neat the national wildlife refuge a bright white light went from our 5 o'clock to 12 o'clock positions.  it came from behind us and my wife and i were both surprised by it.  clearly was not a plane, it was moving too fast, not a comet as it had no tail or trail behind it, too big/bright to be a shooting star.  

we then made it up to seymour entrance to i69 north and got on our way.  just a couple minutes after we were on the interstate 3-5 lights appeared out of nowhere to the east of the interstate.   they were there for about 10 seconds, converged and disappeared.  there was no noise, no flash- nothing, they were just gone.   now we are a bit weirded out.  it was the same brightness and consistency of the light that shot over us just a few minutes earlier.     

third encounter was just a few minutes after this cluster of lights.  this time they were to the west of the interstate and a grouping of 3-5 solid lights were in a pretty straight line.  they all appeared and vanished at the same time. 

i am aware that there is a national guard post north of where this happened, but the guard usually plays on the weekends, and this was on a thursday night and we were 34 miles south of where the post is. i've mapped everything out and tried to debunk this, but it was very odd.  if the first sighting of the night was the only one, i would have chalked it up to being a meteor, but 3 sightings in 30 minutes was too strange.
content.summary: 3 sightings of weird lights within 30 minutes of eachother along i -69

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Went out for a smoke watching the thunderhead above grow then noticed a dot in the sky that wasn't moving. thought to myself it was a weather balloon, but it didn't move at all. the sky was mostly cloudy some sun with chance of thunderstorms, i watched it for at least five minutes as it hovered just around the cloud. it wasn't quite under the cloud but near the edge of it. the object seemed to stay in one place as the cloud moved. it appeared to be higher than lower clouds. it looked red at times but that may have been just my eyes from staring at the sky. i wonder if the airport nearby noticed it on radar. planes fly over all the time here and i don't know if they fly weather balloons near busy airports  there was a break in the clouds that allowed sunlight through and that's when i lost sight. a small strange looking cloud formed near the spot were i lost sight but that may have been just the clouds and had nothing to do with it. i'm filing this report in case the sighting is more than a weather balloon. i don't know who to call to find out and just maybe someone else had seen it too.
content.summary: It looked red at first then black

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the swing on the front porch. listening to internet radio on my phone, having a drink and smoking a cigarette.  i look up to the left a bit and right above the tree line, about 300 - 500 ft away and i noticed a set of lights over the trees and i thought to myself, that plane is flying really low. it's going to crash. that's when i noticed directly up and right of the set of lights, 3 more lights. in a line  .     .     .        and i focused on them and all of a sudden a fourth light appeared 
.   .   .  .   and as the light on the left appeared the one on the right disappeared.. so i stand up and walk to the side of the porch. to get a better look. as i'm standing there looking at these two sets of lights i'm saying to myself out loud, "you have to be kidding me, this isn't happening. i am not seeing this"  and i immediately think of my phone sitting on the railing at the end of the porch.. i glance over at my phone thinking, i need a picture of this. i looked back up in the sky and it was as if it knew i was going to take a picture of it and it all just disappeared.. i sat back down in the swing and started yelling for it to come back.  strange
content.summary: 3 lights side by side, then two lights side by side a little below

content.detailedDescription:
40 years of aviation experience as naval aviator and commercial pilot.

while looking out the hotel window (toward the north) from about 10th floor i observed an object traveling from west to east at an elevation that did not enable me to fix a distance or size as it did not traverse any building or other physical object. the interesting thing here is that the hotel is directly east of lax and under the arrival flight paths to lax.

the object appeared to be kind of an elongated octahedron oriented vertically vice horizontally with distinct corners and slowly rotating clockwise as viewed from the ground. it appeared to be a kinda burnt orange color, so at first i thought that it was an errant target from the pacific missile test range out of pt. mugu. but no, the targets that they use are bright international orange, and besides, from many years experience on the range, i have never seen a target that was that shape or color.

the object moved slowly and horizontally and was in my sight less than a minute. this is one of the times one wishes for a camera or binoculars. 
i thought that it must be some sort of balloon, but i soon eliminated that as it flew horizontally and did not appear to be influenced by the relatively strong winds coming over the city. this one fact might indicate that it was quite a bit higher than the buildings.

so, i have no idea what it was. i saw nothing in the papers. also, since it happened in "controlled airspace" with all sorts of commercial traffic arriving it is hard to believe that nobody reported it.

that is it in a nutshell.
content.summary: Airborne burnt orange octahedron shaped object  seen from hotel room

content.detailedDescription: I woke up one night from bed well after my fiance and i had fell asleep. i was sitting on the end of the bed looking at one of the "others" (entity)in the room at the foot of the bed between the bed and the window/wall, which, along with the computer desk, was all i could see behind him. he began conversing in a language which i did not and do not understand as it was comprised of mostly metal-scraping sound and chirping. i saw the "other", he had big oval obsidian eyes and stood about 5'6". i could not understand the language yet i knew what he way saying, as if he were communicating telepathically in a manner i could understand. i distinctly remember him tell me his name in a way i could speak it as "raucyac", and told me that he was there to talk to me. he also "told" me that he was a youth in his culture, and with the soft features and gentle bearing it felt to be accurate. i also felt safe and mentally intimate and a strong bond to him. we talked for a long period of time, but i am not sure how long as i was entranced on him. i remember that he was conversing with me for a long time as friends would, but i do not recall everything that we spoke about. at one point in the conversation, he pointed at my sleeping fiance and made what i am equating to be a smile. he had very long, slender, wiry arms and fingers. his skin was a graphite to deep steel color. he was quite thin as i could see his ribcage. he then made his goodbye and i blacked out and the next thing i remember i blacked out and woke up the next morning extremely refreshed and energetic and happy.
content.summary: Personal encounter with

content.detailedDescription: Driving from san diego to palmdale ca. on route 138 at approximately 9 pm. my oldest son (18) was sitting in the back seat and said whats that? my daughter (16) in the front me driving and my nephew (14) in the back seat with my son. the kids pointed it out to me. i pulled over so i could observe. the object was a red orb approximately golfball or baseball size from our point of view, pulsating slowly then vanished. didnt move anywhere just dissappeared. about a minute later the orb reappeared in the same place and started emmitting what looked like shooting stars but they were falling to the ground. after about 6 of these slow falling stars the orb dissappeared again, only to return after approx. 1 minute and started the star deployment again, this time with 10 stars falling. the orb did this same thing 2 more times, so a total of 4 vanashings and reappearances. the last appearance it dropped 5 more of these stars and the red orm got really bright and dissappeared for good this time. as a former army paratrooper ive seen flairs and helocopters at night and this isnt one of them. its taken me this long to go through my head to figure out what it was. i have no explination as to what it was. now im not very familiar with rte 138 as im new to this area. as for exact location i could probably find it again but it was nighttime and again im unfamiliar with the area. if there is any other info please do not hesitate to contact.
content.summary: Red pulsating light emmitting white pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car waiting for my wife to come out of the library. i was looking at the sky, and noticed a large blimp looking object in the sky. it didnt look like it had the section on the bottom that you ride in. it didnt look like it was moving at all. i watched it for about 5 minutes it just looked like it was hovering. my first thought is that it could be a drone. but this didnt have wings and it had to be very large. it was very high up in the sky. higer then most planes i have seen fly by. and it still looked large. i turned my head to see if my wife was coming. i looked away for maybe 5 seconds and it was gone. i couldnt see it anywhere. with planes or a blimp or balloon anything like that you would still be able to see it. this thing was gone.
content.summary: A very large blimp without the lower section you ride in.

content.detailedDescription:
Just after the 10:00 oclock news came on the tv, july 2,2011, i went outside and from my front porch i looked up and saw four very pretty red lights in the sky.  i went in and got my wife and had her come out and look. we went out the back door because the lights were moving in that direction. they were directly overhead in a clear stary sky.  we watched as they moved off to the northeast.  we looked back and four more were comming. no sound, no flashing or rotating like an aircraft beacon. these four moved off following the first four.  then four more came and followed the others. they were directly overhead, i would guess at about 500 to 800 feet.  we watched them fly away toward the northeast very slowly wntil they all disappeared out of sight, probably 15 to 20 miles away.  they were getting higher in the sky as they flew away.
later i went to the gas station to get a news paper and i ask the clerk if he saw the lights, he said yes, we all saw them and wondered what they were.  and thats my question too. what were they.  i was a pilot and flight instructor when i was younger, i am now 73 years old and i have seen a lot, but i have no explaination for what i saw. just red lights flying by themselves, twelve lights following each other, not in a stright line, not all at exactly the same altitude, but maintaining the same position as a group slowly, silently moving away.
if you have an answer i would sure like to know it.
content.summary: Red/orange lightys , three groups of four passed directly overhead.  very bright , pretty lights, no sound, no flashing or rotating, directly overhead in clear stary sky, mover off to the north east.
